price: ߞߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߌ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߜߙߊ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
